values.BestTool: Best Mobile Payment API Solution in Gabon
values.ValueProposition: Accelerate your growth by integrating a free, easy to use, secure and adapted to the African context way of payment.
values.WhyAPI: SingPay is an electronic payment portal via mobile money: SingPay's cloud services communicate with electronic payment information systems provided by SingPay partners.
values.WhyGateway: SingPay provides a RESTfull API allowing you to perform mobile money requests which are carried out natively in the GSM context from a solution operating in the web context.SingPay ensures the reliability, security and regulation of these domain translations.
values.WhyDashboard: SingPay offer us the possibility to create multiple wallets to manage your accounts and follow the operation.
values.CreateAccountNowIsFree: Create an account now it is free
values.PaimentExplain: Allow your customers to make mobile money payments from your online payment platform.
values.WalletExplain: Upon signing the online payment contract with one of SingPay's partner phone houses, use the merchant account information received to create a new wallet on the SingPay dashboard. You can then use it as a credit account receiver.
values.JournalExplain: Consult the history of operations carried out on your various SingPay wallets: The date, status, amount, ..., of each request made on the wallet.
values.WordPressExplain: Did you realise your website on wordpress? Easily integrate the wordpress plugin from singpay
values.PrestashopExplain: Did you realise your website on prestashop? Easily integrate the prestashop plugin from singpay.
values.ExternalisationExplain: You don't want to make any development regarding payment, you can outsource your payment process by synchronizing with our secure online payment platform without needing to code anything.
values.StartupExplain: Below 25 Million transactions registered on SingPay, you benefit from 0% fees.
values.EnterpriseExplain: Company having achieved a turnover of more than 25 Million CFA Francs.
values.AdminExplain: Digital solutions ordered by the public administration
values.PricingNB: your status will be determined based on the information that will be provided upon registration. The status is reassessed every year
values.Presentation: SingPay is a mobile payment API integrator developed by the Gabon Digital Incubation Company to help startups get started faster by lowering the barrier to revenue sharing with other players imposed by traditional integrators.
